Body: A friend has 2 Lexibook android tablets (kids' tablets). One is completely clean and the other is fine.He wants his clean android to be exactly the same as his good one.How does he copy?I got the tablet's in my hands and the main problem until now is I can't even download nandroid. Is there anyway I can?Please note: he is looking to have a complete copy, not just data and not just software.
Title: How to save an ISO (or similar) of a whole Lexibook tablet (Android SO)?

history.Text: A friend has 2 android tablets. One has problems (it might be too much stuff installed but not sure) and the other is fine.He wants his faulty android to be exactly the same as his good one.How does he copy?What software does he need? And what devices? An SD drive is enough? Or maybe just a USB table?Please note: he is looking to have a complete copy, not just data and not just software.All his software is 100% free so there is no problem piracy problem.
How to save an ISO (or similar) of a whole Android system?
